pageProduct.name: Pentavite Calcium + Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids 60 Chewable Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Pentavite® Calcium + Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Chewables are a premium formulation containing Vitamin D3 & Vitamin K2 to support strong bones and teeth in children aged 2 -12 years old.

Calcium is an important mineral for growing children as it assists with building healthy bones and maintaining strong bones. Vitamin D3 helps the body absorb dietary Calcium while Vitamin K2 helps support bone mineralisation.

With natural strawberry flavour, Pentavite® Calcium + Vitamin D3 & K2 Kids Chewables is a great tasting formula kids will love.
  • No added artificial colours, flavours or sweeteners 
  • No added dairy 
  • No added gluten 
  • Vegetarian friendly 
Dedicated to Children's Health

Suitable For: Vegetarian friendly. 2 - 12 years old.

Boxed Contents: 60 chewable tablets

Size: 60 Tablets

Dermatologist Tested?: n/a

Dermatologically Tested?: n/a

Soap-Free?: n/a

Alcohol Free?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• Maintains strong bones & teeth
• Supports dietary calcium absorption
• Helps support bone mineralisation
• Supports intake of calcium when dietary sources may be inadequate
• Maintains strong bones and teeth
• Maintains healthy immune system function
• Supports general health and wellbeing

Warnings

Vitamin and mineral supplements should not replace a balanced diet.
Do not use if seal under cap is broken or missing.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Supports general health and wellbeing.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each chewable tablet contains:
Calcium (from calcium citrate tetrahydrate 592.98mg) 125mg.
Vitamin D3 (Colecalciferol) 8.25 microgram (330IU).
Vitamin K2 (menaquinone 7) 6.25 microgram.

Allergen Free From: Dairy| Gluten

Directions

Chew, do not swallow whole. Take with food.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 25°C.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Please recycle.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
